review_title: Asst Professor, Managerial & Business Communication, 2011, FIIB
job_title: Assistant Professor, Managerial & Business Communication, 2011 in New Delhi
pros:
I worked at FIIB as Asst Professor, Managerial & Business Communication, 2011. What I really liked about them were a lot of things. Excellent initiatives, good infrastructure, salary on time, ease of approachability, the willingness of top management to listen and understand, and also flexibility.

I loved the attitude of "student above all" and I personally found that the management was very particular about ensuring that not only were the students learning in a fun-filled, stress-free environment, but also they enjoyed learning, and had enough time to enjoy sports and extra-curricular activities.

I had to leave in 7 months as I was having health issues, but I loved every minute of my tenure, and made some wonderful friends in both faculty and students.
FIIB is not just a college, it's a beautiful family that grows!
cons: I personally found no downside to working there, I loved the culture!
